title: SNAP+STYLE Announces Mary Connelly As Chief Revenue Officer
text:
SNAP+STYLE
Conde Nast Associate Publisher Joins The Team At New Fashion Platform
NEW YORK , Oct. 8, SNAP+STYLE, the curated online personal styling platform that connects women with professional stylists in real time, today announced the hire of Mary Connelly as Chief Revenue Officer. Ms. Connelly has over 20 years of experience leading exceptional sales forces and driving revenue generation for Conde Nast's highest grossing titles, including VOGUE, VANITY FAIR, and most recently GLAMOUR, where she has served as Associate Publisher since 2014.
In her new position, Connelly will help the new fashion platform accelerate growth, driving integration and alignment between all revenue-related functions.
"I'm thrilled to have been asked to join the SNAP+STYLE team," says Connelly of her new role. "The opportunity for a female consumer to engage with her own personal stylist through a mobile application, in real time, offers incredible consumer value. Additionally, the next level technology of the S+S platform provides a revolutionary approach to optimizing brand engagement. The clienteling opportunities are endless. I look forward to building the platform's community by creating partnerships for retail brands to engage women in a seamless and organic way, enhancing the shopping experience."
"We are so excited to have Mary join our team," explains co founder Anna Jensen . "The combination of her deep industry knowledge and leadership track record mixed with her enthusiasm and innovative approach make her the perfect fit for SNAP+STYLE.
We are looking forward to her stewardship in building our community through exciting and lasting brand partnerships."
Chairman Raul Fernandez says, "Recruiting Mary, an industry veteran with unparalleled skills and experience, speaks to the opportunity we all feel exists to fully realize the potential of SNAP+STYLE; creating a platform that literally changes the conversation with the consumer and provides a deeper richer interaction between brands, publications and consumers."

ABOUT SNAP+STYLE
SNAP+STYLE is a curated online styling platform that connects women with professional stylists in real time. Offering personalized fashion recommendations that pair items from users' wardrobes with apparel for purchase, SNAP+STYLE effectively combines tech and touch to turn women's style ambitions into chic, attainable reality.
Founded, developed and perfected by a team of top tech experts and fashion industry veterans, and launched in 2015, SNAP+STYLE's aim is to evolve the way women shop, one click and conversation at a time.
